project_01.title: High-precision 2-axis motion table
project_01.description: A high-precision 2-axis table with a ball screw drive. A special 2-axis high-precision table was designed using a ball screw drive, stepper motors, and optical encoders. It enables a movement accuracy of approximately 5 Âµm

project_02.title: 2D laser measuring scanner
project_02.description: A 2D laser measuring scanner with airflow, cooling, and a robot mount. We've designed a wide range of laser scanners for a variety of tasks and applications

project_03.title: 2D laser scanner for large measurement ranges
project_03.description: A 2D laser scanner for large measurement ranges, with airflow and cooling. A wide range of laser scanners has been designed for various tasks and applications.

project_04.title: Laser measuring system for determining wear and parameters of railway wheels
project_04.description: A laser measuring system for determining wear and parameters of railway wheels. A complex measuring system has been designed, including specialized optical laser scanners, a drive-based protective shutter system, a thermal stabilization system, a blower system for the optical instrument lenses, a concrete/rail mounting system, and a specialized calibration device

project_05.title: Mobile robot on mecanum wheels
project_05.description: A mobile robot on mecanum wheels. A miniature mobile robot with mecanum wheels and a stereo camera has been designed. It is designed for a variety of purposes and locations

project_06.title: Robot gripper
project_06.description: Robot gripper. A special gripper designed for industrial robots and cobots

project_07.title: Collaborative robot
project_07.description: A collaborative robot. A series of collaborative robots has been designed using a hollow-shaft motor, a harmonic gearbox, and composite materials

project_08.title: Automated robotic salad making machine
project_08.description: An automated robotic salad preparation machine. An automated robotic salad preparation machine has been designed, comprising a collaborative robot, a specialized gripper, a sequential plate delivery mechanism, a sauce dispensing mechanism, a gripper-changing mechanism, a salad delivery mechanism, and more

project_09.title: Automatic packaging complex
project_09.description: Automatic packaging complex. An automated food packaging system was designed. Cobots and delta robots, as well as conveyors, were used

project_10.title: Anthropomorphic gripper
project_10.description: An anthropomorphic gripper. A special gripping mechanism was designed to mimic the anatomy and movements of the human hand. Multi-axis torque sensors are embedded in the fingertips
